trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> interface to create a request message that acts as a method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"> </xref> 인터페이스 역할을 원격 개체에 대 한 메서드 호출을 하는 요청 메시지를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The MethodCall class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: MethodCall 클래스는.NET Framework의 원격 인프라에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an instance of the MethodCall class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: MethodCall 클래스의 인스턴스를 직접 만들 필요가 없습니다. 대신, 사용 된 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>인터페이스.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: MethodCall contains remoting data that is passed between message sinks.
trans-unit.target: MethodCall은 메시지 싱크 간에 전달 되는 원격 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A remoting client sends a MethodCall message to a server.
trans-unit.target: 원격 클라이언트는 서버에 MethodCall 메시지를 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> class from an array of remoting headers.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"> </xref> 원격 헤더의 배열에서 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만들 필요가 없습니다는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall>클래스를 직접; 대신,는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>인터페이스.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall>

trans-unit.source: An array of remoting headers that contains key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 키/값 쌍을 포함 하는 원격 헤더의 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> fields for headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
trans-unit.target: 이 배열을 초기화 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"> </xref> "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties" 네임 스페이스에 속하는 헤더에 대 한 필드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> class by copying an existing message.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"> </xref> 기존 메시지를 복사 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만들 필요가 없습니다는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall>클래스를 직접; 대신,는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>인터페이스.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall>

trans-unit.source: A remoting message.
Gets the number of arguments passed to a method.
trans-unit.target: 메서드에 전달 된 인수의 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of arguments passed to a method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>메서드에 전달 된 인수의 수를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of arguments passed to a method.
trans-unit.target: 메서드에 전달 된 인수의 배열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents the arguments passed to a method.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref:System.Object>메서드에 전달 된 인수를 나타내는.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The ExternalProperties field is also accessible through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.Properties%2A> property.
To be added.
Gets a method argument, as an object, at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에 있는 개체로 메서드 인수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument as an object.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에서 메서드 인수로의 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument.
Gets a method argument at a specified index that is not marked as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 로 표시 되지 않는 지정된 된 인덱스에 메서드 인수를 가져옵니다는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument that is not marked as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 로 표시 되지 않는 메서드 인수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index that is not marked as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 로 표시 되지 않는 지정된 된 인덱스에서 메서드 인수로의 이름을 가져옵니다는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument that is not marked as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이름으로 표시 되지 않은 메서드 인수의 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method is not implemented.
The GetObjectData method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
The data for serializing or deserializing the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 데이터를 직렬화 또는 역직렬화 원격 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The context of a certain serialized stream.
Gets a value that indicates whether the method can accept a variable number of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 가변 개수의 인수를 수락할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method can accept a variable number of arguments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>메서드가 가변 개수의 인수; 수락 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an internal serialization handler from an array of remoting headers that are applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: 메서드에 적용 되는 원격 헤더의 배열에서 한 내부 직렬화 처리기를 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The value of the first header in the input array is the method name.
trans-unit.target: 입력 배열의 첫 번째 헤더의 값은 메서드 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of remoting headers that contain key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 키/값 쌍을 포함 하는 원격 헤더의 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> fields for headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
trans-unit.target: 이 배열을 초기화 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"> </xref> "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties" 네임 스페이스에 속하는 헤더에 대 한 필드입니다.

trans-unit.source: An internal serialization handler.
Gets the number of arguments in the method call that are not marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 로 표시 되지 않은 메서드 호출의 인수 개수를 가져옵니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of arguments in the method call that are not marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>로 표시 되지 않은 메서드 호출의 인수 수를 나타내는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of arguments in the method call that are not marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 로 표시 되지 않은 메서드 호출의 인수는 배열을 가져옵니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents arguments in the method call that are not marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref:System.Object>으로 표시 되지 않은 메서드 호출에 인수를 나타내는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""> </xref> 매개 변수.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"> </xref> 현재 메서드 호출에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"> </xref> 현재 메서드 호출에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
Gets the name of the invoked method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>호출 된 메서드의 이름을 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 메서드 시그니처를 포함 하는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.Object> that contains the method signature.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The Properties property returns the value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.ExternalProperties> field.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Sets method information from previously initialized remoting message properties.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 초기화 remoting에서 메서드 정보 메시지 속성을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The method belongs to a remote object.
The value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.MethodBase%2A> property is set through the ResolveMethod method.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.MethodBase%2A>ResolveMethod 메서드를 통해 속성이 설정 되어 있습니다.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.MethodBase%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets method information from serialization settings.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The data for serializing or deserializing the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 데이터를 직렬화 또는 역직렬화 원격 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The context of a given serialized stream.
Gets the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
trans-unit.target: 메서드 호출이 수행 되는 원격 개체의 전체 유형 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>메서드 호출이 수행 되는 원격 개체의 전체 형식 이름이 들어 있는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
trans-unit.target: 식별자 URI (Uniform Resource)은 메서드 호출이 수행 되는 원격 개체를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The URI of a remote object.
